content: Hi, we've been looking for a place to store Patient Alerts as held in a Hospital EMR (dangerous dog at home, patient with MRSA etc.). It looks like the FLAG resource (https://www.hl7.org/fhir/flag.html) is best for this - but its only Maturity Level 1. Is anyone else using this resource? Thanks!
I believe that would indeed be the appropriate place for that.
